title: A Deep Learning Approach to Antibiotic Discovery
abstract: Applies GNN to identify antibiotics. Successfully discovered Halicin using molecular graph data.

title: Neural Message Passing for Quantum Chemistry
abstract: Introduces the Message Passing Neural Network (MPNN) for quantum property prediction.

title: Threat Detection in Cybersecurity Using Graph Neural Networks
abstract: Models network logs as graphs to detect threats with high accuracy.

title: Financial Fraud Detection Using Graph Neural Networks
abstract: Applies GNN to transaction networks to detect fraudulent behavior using multi-hop features.

title: Spatio-Temporal Graph Structure Learning for Traffic Forecasting
abstract: Forecasts traffic speed using dynamically learned spatio-temporal graph structures.

title: Graph Neural Networks for Social Recommendation
abstract: Combines user-item graphs with social links to improve recommendations.

title: Session-Based Recommendation with Graph Neural Networks
abstract: Uses GNNs to model user session behavior for improved recommendations.

title: Fake News Detection on Social Media: A Data Mining Perspective
abstract: Detects fake news using information propagation patterns modeled as graphs.

title: Predicting Protein-Protein Interactions with Deep Graph Neural Networks
abstract: Predicts PPIs using deep GNN models to analyze structural protein graphs.

title: Modeling Relational Data with Graph Convolutional Networks
abstract: Applies R-GCN for link prediction and entity classification in knowledge graphs.
